input.sentences: a big crowd came out for the fitness fair in the park .
it was all about health - the staff even had fitness balls to sit on .
there is nothing more relaxing than yoga in the great outdoors .
everyone felt great after the yoga class .
after the yoga class | there were a lot of booths to visit with tons of great information !
output.sentences: I went to the park to attend a fitness fair today.
The staff were sitting on balls and talking about health.
I even participated in the outdoors yoga course, and it was super relaxing.
I made sure to snap a photo with a new friend I made during the yoga class.
There are tons of things to do when visiting the yoga courses.
